author: bef7103
title: Wine open market - Stappato
description: Access to wine can be challenging: allocations and waiting lists are notoriously hard to get into and restrict participation in the market
solution: Develop an open trade platform for the rights to buy wine directly from producers enabling broader and fair access and increased liquidity
experience: Team of 3 with multiple years of experience in the industry including blockchain professional and sommelier graduate +wine world connections
